C

ChangeComputation - Class in Unnamed Package
This class simulates a cash register with the capability to process USD in a foreign country that uses Euros.
ChangeComputation() - Constructor for class ChangeComputation
Constructs a ChangeComputation object where the cash register simulation takes place.
ChangeComputationJUnit - Class in Unnamed Package
This class contains JUnit test methods for testing the functionality of class ChangeComputation.
ChangeComputationJUnit() - Constructor for class ChangeComputationJUnit
 
ChangeComputationTest - Class in Unnamed Package
This class serves as the entry point for running the ChangeComputation program.
ChangeComputationTest() - Constructor for class ChangeComputationTest
 
changeInEuros(BigDecimal, BigDecimal) - Static method in class ChangeComputation
Calculates the change in Euros to return to the user.
